SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, b.board_no, b.title, b.location, b.post_date, b.hit, b.content, b.delete_status, b.user_id, b.board_cate, u.user_nick FROM ( SELECT board_no, title, location, post_date, hit, content, delete_status, user_id, board_cate FROM boardTB WHERE board_cate = 4 ORDER BY board_no DESC ) b INNER JOIN userTB u ON b.user_id = u.user_id ) subquery WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startNo} AND #{endNo}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, user_nick FROM ( SELECT board_no, title, location, post_date, hit, content, delete_status, user_id, board_cate, (SELECT user_nick FROM userTB WHERE user_id = boardtb.user_id) AS user_nick FROM boardTB WHERE board_cate = 4 ORDER BY board_no DESC ) ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startNo} AND #{endNo}
